mapper.select: /* MemberSegmentMapper.xml, selectMemberSegment, SAC/서대영, 2014-11-14 */ SELECT OUTSD_MBR_LEVEL_CD ,INSD_MBR_LEVEL_CD ,SEX ,AGE_CLSF_CD ,DEVICE_CHG_YN ,NEW_ENTRY_YN ,MNO_CD ,CATEGORY_BEST ,CATEGORY_PREFER FROM TB_DP_SMART_OFR_MBR WHERE TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND USER_KEY = #{userKey}
